Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi dismissed Virat Kohli early in the innings
KL Rahul was caught on the first ball of the third over
Virat Kohli scored 53 runs with Rishabh Pant to take India to 151-7
Babar Azam scored an unbeaten 68 while Mohammad Rizwan contributed 78 runs
Pakistan won the match by 10 wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli acknowledged that Pakistan outplayed and outclassed India
Babar Azam expressed confidence in building on this win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's bowling was described as 'precision-guided missiles'
Azam's timing and placement were described as immaculate
